testsuite.name: Verify getDisplayType returns the appropriate type value

testcase.classname: Verify getDisplayType returns the appropriate type value
testcase.name: should return 'appointment' when the kind is visit and the uid is an appointment uid

testcase.classname: Verify getDisplayType returns the appropriate type value
testcase.name: should return 'visit' when the kind is visit and the uid is a visit uid

testcase.classname: Verify getDisplayType returns the appropriate type value
testcase.name: should return the kind when the kind is not visit
